group_1.textCenter: If I were to turn into one of these "Magical@Girls"...
I could wish for anything at all, and it'll@come true?!

group_1.narration: I thought a cat or something@came into my room at first.
But it talked just like a person.@It felt like I was dreaming.
And then offered a contract that@would make me a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: Any wish I have will come true?

group_1.narration: I couldn't believe it. I mean,@it sounded like a fairy tale.
The feeling of being in my room,@my breath, the beating of my heart...
All of my senses were telling me@that everything was real.

group_1.textLeft: B-but...I'm not sure about this Magical@Girl thing.
Besides, I don't have a wish.

group_1.narration: I wanted us to go back to how things were.@If I had to wish for something right now,@that would be it.

group_1.textLeft: Uh, Kyubey? I actually do have a wish, but...
I feel like it's something that I have to@take care of myself.
So, I'm really sorry, but I don't...

group_1.narration: Even after I said that, Kyubey told me to@take all the time I needed to think it over@and left without pressuring me further.
The last thing he said was that he would@return when "the time" came.
